name: Marin Housing Authority
description: Section 8 housing vouchers for Marin County residents
fullDescription: The Marin Housing Authority administers Section 8 vouchers and affordable housing programs for low-income residents in Marin County.
whatTheyOffer:
- Section 8 Housing Choice Vouchers
- Public housing
- Project-based vouchers
- VASH vouchers for homeless veterans
- Family self-sufficiency program
howToGetIt:
1. Check MHA website for waitlist status
2. Apply during open enrollment
3. Must meet income limits
4. Marin County residents get preference
5. Wait for lottery selection
address: 4020 Civic Center Drive, San Rafael, CA 94903
keywords: Marin Housing Authority, Section 8, housing voucher, Marin County, low-income, waitlist, San Rafael
